attributes.action: Ban the demonstration of banks of TV sets switched on all day in retailers shops in the Uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are told how important it is to switch TVs etc off from merely standby.How much more important to switch off 1000s of TVs on all day?This is surely less troublesome than a total revision of our light bulbs,and unlike grandiose proposals re global warming is easily achievable.
